scripts.run: npm run run:c++ && npm run run:c# && npm run run:java && npm run run:js && npm run run:kotlin && npm run run:swift && npm run run:go && npm run run:haskel && npm run run:python
scripts.run:c++: cd code && g++ naïve.cpp && time ./a.out && rm ./a.out
scripts.run:c#: cd code && mcs naïve.cs && time mono naïve.exe
scripts.run:java: cd code && javac naïve.java && time java Naïve
scripts.run:kotlin: cd code && kotlinc naïve.kt -include-runtime -d naïve.jar && time java -jar naïve.jar
scripts.run:go: cd code && go build naïve.go && time ./naïve
